categories: Category:Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook fiction

nodes.text: Hand-Off was a short story written by Peter M. Schweighofer, and was published in the Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook.

After bounty hunters attack Koth Melan's safehouse on Kothlis, injured Bothan Spynet operative SecOps Four struggles to escape with a case containing stolen Imperial data on Death Star II. He is stopped by members of Borsk Fey'lya's spynet faction led by Vord'lya, who stun SecOps Four and steal the case with the intent to deliver the data to the Rebel Alliance themselves, in order to give Fey'lya's faction the credit for having acquired it.
